main event: A civilian scientist at Nellis AFB observed a bright light with a flashing red light on top for about 40 minutes, concluding it may have been a balloon.
interesting points: The object glowed brightly and expanded, then shrank back to original size,It hovered before moving upwards out of sight,The object was approximately 5 feet in diameter and 10 miles away,It did not emit any sound or leave physical evidence,The sighting lasted about 5 minutes with no unusual aerial maneuvers.
sighted object: a bright light with a flashing red light and solid green areas
witness description: Civilian Scientist for the United States Air Force
